On June 6, 2010, Saeed had been sitting on the second floor of a [[cybercafe]]. Two detectives from the [[Sidi Gaber]] police station entered the premises and arrested him, allegedly beating him and smashing him against objects as he was led outside to their police car.<ref>{{cite news |title=Two witnesses affirm Alex victim beaten by police |author= |url=http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/news/two-witnesses-affirm-alex-victim-beaten-police |newspaper=[[Almasry Alyoum]] |date=June 19, 2010 |accessdate=January 26, 2011}}</ref>
On June 6, 2010, Saeed had been sitting on the second floor of a [[cybercafe]]. Two detectives from the [[Sidi Gaber]] police station entered the premises and arrested him, allegedly beating him and smashing him against objects as he was led outside to their police car.<ref>{{cite news |title=Two witnesses affirm Alex victim beaten by police |author= |url=http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/news/two-witnesses-affirm-alex-victim-beaten-police |newspaper=[[Almasry Alyoum]] |date=June 19, 2010 |accessdate=January 26, 2011}}</ref>
Line 73: Line 73:
==Investigation and trial of the police officers==
==Investigation and trial of the police officers==
â
The investigation into Saeed's death yielded 300 papers, analysis and testimony which informed the decision to charge both police officers, Mahmoud Salah Mahmoud and Awad Ismael Suleiman, in criminal court with use of violence and unjustified detention of the victim.<ref>http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/55686</ref> They were detained in July 2010,<ref>http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/53178</ref> and the trial began in July but was postponed and did not resume until February 2011. <ref>http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/302734</ref>
+
The investigation into Saeed's death yielded 300 papers, analysis and testimony which informed the decision to charge both police officers, Mahmoud Salah Mahmoud and Awad Ismael Suleiman, in criminal court with use of violence and unjustified detention of the victim.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/55686 |title=exclusive: Khaled Saeed case investigation | Al-Masry Al-Youm: Today's News from Egypt |publisher=Al-Masry Al-Youm |date= |accessdate=2011-03-23}}</ref> They were detained in July 2010,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/53178 |title=2 Alex policemen detained in Khaled Saeed case | Al-Masry Al-Youm: Today's News from Egypt |publisher=Al-Masry Al-Youm |date=2010-06-30 |accessdate=2011-03-23}}</ref> and the trial began in July but was postponed and did not resume until February 2011. <ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/302734 |title=Alexandriaâs Khaled Saeed police brutality trial postponed | Al-Masry Al-Youm: Today's News from Egypt |publisher=Al-Masry Al-Youm |date=2011-01-22 |accessdate=2011-03-23}}</ref>
